DOC.brief_summary: This 4 Â½ week study 20 healthy subject ( include 2 week run-in ) . Subjects take vegetable/fruit juice supplementation 3 day . Blood , urine stool sample collect baseline , day 4 day 17 . The purpose study determine effect fruit/vegetable supplementation colonic flora .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Fruit/Vegetable Drinks Human Intestine
DOC.detailed_description: A total 20 subject recruit The UCLA Center Human Nutrition/Clinical Trials Unit database , print and/or radio advertisement , UCLA campus wide e-mail , clinicaltrials.gov website , flyer post campus community . Interested person call telephone number dedicate study instruct leave name phone number . These individual contact study staff member , briefly describe study answer question ascertain interest . If individual interested ask complete brief pre-screen form telephone establish eligibility . Individuals remain interested invited screen visit . Pre-screen survey eligible shredded . At screening , informed consent HIPAA authorization review sign prior procedure do , medical history obtain . If subject healthy medical history follow procedure conduct : - fast blood sample collect routine safety lab ( CBC Chemistry Panel ) - complete medical medication history - brief physical examination ( include vital sign , height weight ) - Dietary instruction limit consumption < 3 serving fruit vegetable , vitamin antibiotic - Dispense material collect fecal sample Results review study physician compliance inclusion exclusion criterion subject collect instruct whether eligible proceed stool collection 2 week dietary compliance . Once collection obtain subject ask return clinic 24 hour . Baseline , day 4 17 During study visit , follow assessment conduct : - Vital sign , body weight - Collect fecal sample - Fasting blood sample - 24 hour urine - Dispense material collect fecal sample - Dispense study supplement ( Baseline Day 17 ) - Assess compliance study supplement - Instructions symptom diary - General well-being questionnaire - Subjects compliant give 3-day supply fruit/vegetable juice end study Subjects instruct start first juice upon wake normally eat breakfast interval approximately two hour throughout day . Five ( 5 ) 16oz . juice one ( 1 ) 16oz almond milk drink numbered subject ask consume product number sequence . Subjects instruct avoid alcohol , caffeine , nicotine hydrate drinking 8 glass water per day duration study . If need , subject allow drink cup herbal tea , water lemon , almonds , cucumber apple fruit/juice supplementation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1850 year age screen 2 . Subjects must read sign Institutional Review Boardapproved write informed consent prior initiation study specific procedure enrollment . A subject exclude condition might compromise ability give truly informed consent . 1 . Any subject history diabetes mellitus medication , hyperlipidemia medication , serious medical condition , chronic hepatic renal disease , bleed disorder , congestive heart disease , chronic diarrhea disorder , myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft , angioplasty within 6 month prior screen , current diagnosis uncontrolled hypertension ( define systolic BP > 160mmHg , diastolic BP > 95mmHg ) , active chronic gastrointestinal disorder , bulimia , anorexia , endocrine disease ( except thyroid disease require medication ) indicate medical history routine physical examination . 2 . Any subject screening laboratory value outside laboratory normal range consider clinically significant study participation investigator . 3 . Any subject currently use tobacco product . 4 . Any history gastrointestinal disease except appendectomy 5 . No antibiotic laxatives use 2 month study . 6 . Any allergy nut 7 . Any subject unable unwilling comply study protocol .
